{"curatedLearningPathStructured":{"rationale":"The selected learning paths and modules focus directly on the skills and knowledge areas required for the Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate certification and its related exam AI-100, which the user aims to prepare for. These learning paths cover essential Azure AI services, AI concepts, and practical solution development skills aligned with the role of an Azure AI Engineer. The inclusion of foundational AI concepts and detailed Azure AI service usage ensures a well-rounded preparation approach suitable for the user\u0027s weekly study time and 8-week duration.","learningPaths":[{"title":"Develop AI information extraction solutions in Azure","url":"https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/ai-extract-information/","estimatedHours":4,"relevance":"This path directly covers Azure AI services and information extraction solutions critical for the role of Azure AI Engineer. It includes practical modules for working with Azure AI content understanding and document intelligence."},{"title":"AI concepts for developers and technology AI, and natural language processing which underpin the skills expected for Azure AI Engineer Associate certification."}],"modules":[{"id":"learn.wwl.analyze-content-ai","title":"Create a multimodal Stay committed and approach each week methodically for best results. Good luck!"},"studentEmail":"funnytrumpsmean@gmail.com","preparationCompletedAtUtc":"2026-02-25T16:37:17.0380846+00:00","workflowTranscript":"## Workflow Transcript\r\n\r\n### Learning Path Curation\r\n**Rationale:** The selected learning paths and modules focus directly on the skills and knowledge areas required for the Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate certification and its related exam AI-100, which the user aims to prepare for. These learning paths cover essential Azure AI services, AI concepts, and practical solution development skills aligned with the role of an Azure AI Engineer. The inclusion of foundational AI concepts and detailed Azure AI service usage ensures a well-rounded preparation approach suitable for the user\u0027s weekly study time and 8-week duration.\r\n### Learning Path Recommendations:\r\n\r\n- [Develop AI information extraction solutions in Azure](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/ai-extract-information/) - Estimated hours: 4. Relevance: This path directly covers Azure AI services and information extraction solutions critical for the role of Azure AI Engineer. It includes practical modules for working with Azure AI content understanding and document intelligence.\r\n- [AI concepts for developers and technology professionals](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/paths/ai-concepts/) - Estimated hours: 5. Relevance: This path provides foundational knowledge of AI concepts, machine learning, generative AI, and natural language processing which underpin the skills expected for Azure AI Engineer Associate certification.\r\n\r\n### Module Recommendations:\r\n\r\n- [Create a multimodal analysis solution with Azure Content Understanding](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/analyze-content-ai/) - Skill focus: Azure AI services for content understanding and multimodal analysis\r\n\r\n- [Create an Azure Content Understanding client application](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/analyze-content-ai-api/) - Skill focus: Developing applications using Azure Content Understanding REST API\r\n\r\n- [Use prebuilt Document intelligence models](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/use-prebuilt-form-recognizer-models/) - Skill focus: Working with prebuilt Azure AI document models\r\n\r\n- [Extract data from forms with Azure Document intelligence](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/work-form-recognizer/) - Skill focus: Extracting data using Azure Document intelligence\r\n\r\n- [Create a knowledge mining solution with Azure AI Search](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/ai-knowldge-mining/) - Skill focus: Building AI knowledge mining solutions with Azure AI Search\r\n\r\n- [Introduction to AI concepts](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-ai-fundamentals/) - Skill focus: Foundational AI concepts and terminology\r\n\r\n- [Introduction to machine learning concepts](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/fundamentals-machine-learning/) - Skill focus: Core machine learning concepts as foundation for AI\r\n\r\n- [Introduction to generative AI and agents](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/fundamentals-generative-ai/) - Skill focus: Understanding generative AI concepts and agent models\r\n\r\n- [Introduction to natural language processing concepts](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-language/) - Skill focus: Fundamentals of NLP with Azure AI\r\n\r\n- [Introduction to AI speech concepts](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-ai-speech/) - Skill focus: Basics of speech recognition and synthesis in AI\r\n\r\n- [Introduction to computer vision concepts](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-computer-vision/) - Skill focus: Understanding computer vision concepts and Azure AI Computer Vision\r\n\r\n- [Introduction to AI-powered information extraction concepts](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/introduction-information-extraction/) - Skill focus: Fundamentals of information extraction using AI\r\n\r\n\r\n### Certification/Exam Targets:\r\n\r\n- [Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate](https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/azure-ai-engineer/) - Type: certification\r\n- [Designing and Implementing an Azure AI Solution (AI-100)](https://learn.microsoft.com/credentials/certifications/exams/ai-100/) - Type: exam\r\n\r\n\r\n### Study Plan\r\n**Plan Title:** Azure AI Engineer Associate Certification Preparation\r\n**Rationale:** The selected learning paths and modules focus directly on the skills and knowledge areas required for the Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate certification and its related exam AI-100, which the user aims to prepare for. These learning paths cover essential Azure AI services, AI concepts, and practical solution development skills aligned with the role of an Azure AI Engineer. The inclusion of foundational AI concepts and detailed Azure AI service usage ensures a well-rounded preparation approach suitable for the user\u0027s weekly study time and 8-week duration.\r\n**Duration:** 8 weeks\r\n**Weekly Study Hours:** 6\r\n### Weekly Milestones:\r\n\r\n#### Week 1: Build foundational AI knowledge and understand core AI concepts.\r\n**Checkpoint:** Complete foundational AI modules and evaluate knowledge with exercises and knowledge checks.\r\n**Daily Sessions:**\r\n- **Day 1**: 60 minutes. Tasks: Introduce AI concepts and terminology., Study generative AI basics.\r\n  URLs:\r\n  - https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/get-started-ai-fundamentals/\r\n- **Day 2**: 60 minutes.
